# A Sample Math Post

Here is an integral:

\[
\int_0^\infty e^{-x^2}\,dx = \frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}.
\]

## Theorem Example

::: {.theorem #thm-gaussian}
**Theorem.** The Gaussian integral satisfies  
\[
\int_{-\infty}^\infty e^{-x^2}\,dx = \sqrt{\pi}.
\]
:::

We can reference it: see Theorem @thm-gaussian.
